title: Bloodstone skarner skin
body: Taric and lissandea have a bloodstone skin. Skarner is clearly one of the best canadites for a bloodstone skin.

We Skarner mains don't talk about the legendary skin, now how can I ship this skin harder?

The thing with Battlecast skar is that he was viktor first battlecast creation "alpha". So battlecast skar by default isnt as futuristic as the other but more of a  garage made feel, which i like. But he for sure is more brutal and muderistic (doubt thats a word).

Only think about a bloodstone skin the colors are similar to battlecast but bloodstone would be much much more slick and shiny. Me like shiny things

why not, That skin is amazing?

And his epic tank weels? no one thinks in the tank weels :(
Skins take months in advance to plan, according to Riot, because their artists are all so busy. A year from now, it'll be the perfect time!
Knowing Riot they'll release a Skarner skin after his ~~castration ~~ rework as a consolation prize to us Skarner mains.

I've been playing him non stop on the PBE to find out his new balance. Currently his rework with the buffs, he is better at single target lockdown, can dual like a god in his buff zones, and he is fairly decent at getting the enemy red due to the positioning on his shrine. The cons of his rework is you have to position yourself just right if you want to peel several people attacking your carry, making him weaker against comps with several bruisers, and he doesn't do well against counter ganks, but boy oh boy you don't want to fight him in his zones.
